result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Johnny M. Spencer

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

3:59 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody in Langlade County Jail.  Attorney Elizabeth Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court notes PD counsel report. Def. continues to wish for counsel. Court reviews Def. right to P.H. Def. wishes to waive time limits on P.H. Court accepts waiver of time limits and believes Def. should have counsel. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:23 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody from Langlade County Jail. Prosecuting attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for the State of Wisconsin, via zoom.  Court reviews history of case. Def. wants to continue to wait for counsel. Court notes counsel report from P.D. Court finds def. needs to wait for counsel and finds good cause to go past time limits for P.H. State has complied with victim rights.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:54 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody in Langlade County Jail.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews case history. Def. has contacted PD office and is still awaiting counsel. Def. continues to ask for Atty. Court agrees.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:47 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody from Langlade County Jail.  Attorney Elizabeth Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin. All parties via zoom. Court reviews history of case. Counsel of Atty Status filed.  Def. will continue to wait.  CC heard on Nhia Lee Standards. State has complied with victim rights.  Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

2:23 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody, via zoom.   Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews history of case.  Def. is waiting for P.D. and will continue to wait. Bond remains.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls 22CM34, 22CT7 & 22CF99 @ 1:39 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Jessica J Prado in court, via zoom for Johnny M. Spencer.  Attorney Kelly L Hays in court for State of Wisconsin.  Atty Prado is only on CM case.  Def. wishes to have counsel on felony case.  Court finds goods cause to go past time limits.  Atty Prado would like offer on CM case.  State would like Status on CM Case. 22CF99 7-25- @ 1:30
Status conference scheduled for August 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Court calls 22CM34, 22CT7 & 22CF99 @02:26 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in court with attorney Jessica J Prado appears only for misdemeanor.  Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in custody.  Elizabeth R. Gebert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video means with Attorney. 22CF99 Def. wants counsel. AIA 6-27-22 @ 1:30.  Atty Prado would request Status.  State would request to track felony case. Bond continues.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court calls 22CT7, 22CM34 & 22CF99 @ 01:48 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in court with attorney Jessica J Prado via zoom.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in court with attorney Jessica J Prado.  Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in custody.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video means with Attorney, via zoom. Atty Prado only handles misdemeanor.  22CM34  Atty Prado enters Not Guilty plea. Court receives Not Guilty. Atty Prado is waiting for discovery. 22CT7 & 22CM34 will be set for Status Cnf. Def. would like to continue to wait for atty to be appointed.  22CF99 will be set for AIA on 6-6-22 @ 1:30 pm.  Atty Prado may appear for zoom on the 6th. Bond continues.  Status conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No illegal use or possession of controlled substances.
No contact with any minors.
Not to leave State of Wisconsin without permission of court.
Surrender passport to Langlade Sheriff Dept.
Not to use any devices with Internet access.
No contact with alleged child victim or alleged victims residence.

01:45 PM Defendant Johnny M. Spencer in court, in custody.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Johnny M. Spencer appeared by video means.   Def. has does not have copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given atty rights and given 3 options, PD, hire own or court appointed atty. State gives bail/bond recommendation and condtions. Def. is on a probation hold.  Def. has nothing. Court orders $10,000 Signature bond with conditions No illegal use or possession of controlled substances.
No contact with any minors. Not to leave State of Wisconsin without permission of court. Surrender passport to Langlade Sheriff Dept. Not to use any devices with Internet access.  & No contact with alleged child victim or alleged victims residence.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
